SELECT A.return_code , A.created_at , C.franchise_name , A.reason , D.name AS member_name , A.comment , A.explanation FROM tbl_return A JOIN tbl_order B ON A.order_code = B.order_code JOIN tbl_franchise C ON B.franchise_code = C.franchise_code LEFT JOIN tbl_member D ON A.member_code = D.member_code WHERE A.return_code = #{ returningCode };
